MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH5 postcode area of Shotton , affecting properties in Ryeland Street, Beaconsfield Road and the surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 4:41pm. Our engineers have arrived on site to investigate the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7:45 pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:38pm on the 1st December 2020.
